entries.caption: Plot of the degree of symmetry of the distribution of a variable (value of 1.0 is most symmetric) vs. the number of distinct values of the variable. Hover over a point to see the variable name and detailed characteristics.
Dot plot of proportion of males by class using Hmisc::summaryM
Continuous variable spike histograms for titanic5 with details as hover text. Hover over the leftmost spike to see a detailed statistical summary for the variable.
Extended box plots showing age and ticket price distributions by sex
Scatter plot of ticket price vs. age with class identified using color
Nonparametric smoother for survival vs. age by class and sex
Histogram of difference in two ages, stratified by imputation type
Moving proportion survived vs. price by class
Extended box plots of age and price by class
Moving proportion survived vs. age by sex and class
